title: Jenkins Shared Library - Gitlab CI migration
description: Designed and developed curated Jenkins shared library/ pipelines in groovy for organization wide application teams with support for multiple languages including Java, JavaScript (Node) and Python which closely mimicked Gitlab CI/CD which included Docker, Kubernetes/ Helm.

title: Scholar Hub - Research Opportunities Platform
description: A comprehensive full-stack web application that helps researchers discover and manage funding opportunities including grants and scholarships. Features personalized AI-powered recommendations, user authentication via Supabase, advanced filtering and search capabilities, bookmark management, and application tracking. Built with modern React frontend and Flask backend with Docker containerization.
